bibl.title: A Loan of Money with Interest.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Acquired from the dealer M. Nahman in 1924. Records a one-month loan of thirty talents with built-in interest of 3,000 drachmas. Oxyrhynchus, 29 August 345 CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Philip Katz, A Loan of Money with Interest.
Acquired from the dealer M. Nahman in 1924. Records a one-month loan of thirty talents with built-in interest of 3,000 drachmas. Oxyrhynchus, 29 August 345 CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
